TopicTitle: Looking for someone to review Kerbol Expanded

Articles.Content:
As I said...

Anyone? I'll link your videos in the thread

Sorry if this appears as spam, I want publicity.

Agh! I want to do this so bad! But I don't have a microphone or a good recording software.

Agh! I want to do this so bad! But I don't have a microphone or a good recording software.

I think free Fraps works up to 15 mins.. idk what to say about the mic problem use a webcam mic if you have one I guess?

I think free Fraps works up to 15 mins.. idk what to say about the mic problem use a webcam mic if you have one I guess?

Well, my family does own a microphone, but my dad uses it for his recordings and whatnot. Plus it's in the basement hooked up to a computer with a ton of complicated wires. Maybe if I get really desperate I'll use my iPod 4's Voice Memos app.
